Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Shaping" or p1.referenceText = "Shaping the pains one at a time") and (p2.name = "Set" or p2.referenceText = "set a row of the little chunks of chocolate on each piece of dough close to a longer edge of the dough")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Set" or p1.referenceText = "set a row of the little chunks of chocolate on each piece of dough close to a longer edge of the dough") 
and (p2.name = "Roll up" or p2.referenceText = "roll up the dough so that it encloses the chocolate")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Roll up" or p1.referenceText = "roll up the dough so that it encloses the chocolate") and (p2.name = "Moisten" or p2.referenceText = "Moisten the end of the dough with a bit of water")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Moisten" or p1.referenceText = "Moisten the end of the dough with a bit of water") and (p2.name = "Place" or p2.referenceText = "place the pain seam side down on the lined baking sheets")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2) 
Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Space the pains at least 2 inches apart.") and (p2.name = "Glaze the pains au chocolat and let them rise.")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Glaze the pains au chocolat and let them rise.") and (p2.name = "Lightly beat together the egg and water for the glaze.")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Lightly beat together the egg and water for the glaze.") and (p2.name = "Brush the pains au chocolat with the egg glaze.")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Brush the pains au chocolat with the egg glaze.") and (p2.name = "Cover and refrigerate the remaining glaze.")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)
Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Mix the flour, germ, and bran for the butter square" or p1.referenceText = "Mix the flour, germ, and bran for the butter square") and (p2.name = "Make the dough" or p2.referenceText = "Make the dough")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Make the dough" or p1.referenceText = "Make the dough") and (p2.name = "Mix the flour, germ, and bran for the butter square" or p2.referenceText = "Mix the flour, germ, and bran for the butter square")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Whisk together 1 tablespoon of the flour, the wheat germ, and wheat bran" or p1.referenceText = "Whisk together 1 tablespoon of the flour, the wheat germ, and wheat bran") and (p2.name = "Make the butter square" or p2.referenceText = "Make the butter square")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Make the butter square" or p1.referenceText = "Make the butter square") and (p2.name = "Make the butter package" or p2.referenceText = "Make the butter package")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Make the butter package" or p1.referenceText = "Make the butter package") and (p2.name = "Roll the dough and make the butter package" or p2.referenceText = "Roll the dough and make the butter package")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Roll the dough and make the butter package" or p1.referenceText = "Roll the dough and make the butter package") and (p2.name = "Wrap it in plastic wrap and refrigerate for no longer than 30 minutes." or p2.referenceText = "Wrap it in plastic wrap and refrigerate for no longer than 30 minutes.")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2) 
Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Preheat the oven to 450F 1 hour before baking.") and (p2.name = "Have an oven shelf at the lower level.")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Have an oven shelf at the lower level.") and (p2.name = "Glaze and bake the pains au chocolat.")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Glaze and bake the pains au chocolat.") and (p2.name = "Gently brush the pains au chocolat again with the egg glaze, being careful to use a light touch so as not to deflate them.")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Gently brush the pains au chocolat again with the egg glaze, being careful to use a light touch so as not to deflate them.") and (p2.name = "Place the pains au chocolat in the oven and turn the oven down to 400F.")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Place the pains au chocolat in the oven and turn the oven down to 400F.") and (p2.name = "Bake for 10 minutes.")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)
 
Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Make the dough") and (p2.name = "Add the milk and mix")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Add the milk and mix") and (p2.name = "Knead for 4 minutes")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Knead for 4 minutes") and (p2.name = "Place the dough in a 1-quart or larger food-storage container or bowl, lightly greased with cooking spray or oil.")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Allow the dough to rise") and (p2.name = "Clean the work surface, For each turn, clean the work surface and reflour it.")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Roll out the dough") and (p2.name = "Make the butter package, Roll the dough and make the butter package.")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Make the butter package, Roll the dough and make the butter package.") and (p2.name = "Do a total of 4 turns, resting the dough for 40 minutes between each turn")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Do a total of 4 turns, resting the dough for 40 minutes between each turn") and (p2.name = "Shape the croissants")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Shape the croissants") and (p2.name = "Glaze croissants, Glaze the croissants and let them rise.")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Glaze croissants, Glaze the croissants and let them rise.") and (p2.name = "Preheat the oven, Preheat the oven to 450F 1 hour before baking.")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Preheat the oven, Preheat the oven to 450F 1 hour before baking.") and (p2.name = "Bake for 10 minutes")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Bake for 10 minutes") and (p2.name = "Reverse the position of the two sheets")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Reverse the position of the two sheets") and (p2.name = "Continue baking for 10 to 15 minutes")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)

Match (p1:Process), (p2:Process)
Where (p1.name = "Continue baking for 10 to 15 minutes") and (p2.name = "Cool the croissants")
Create (p1)-[r:FOLLOWED_BY]->(p2)
```cypher
CREATE (:FinalProduct {name: "Croissants and Pains au Chocolat Recipe"})
```MATCH (p:Process), (f:FinalProduct)
WHERE (p.name = "They are best eaten warm" or p.referenceText = "They are best eaten warm (when the outside is crisp and light, the center soft and tender) or within 3 hours after baking.")
      AND f.name = "Croissants and Pains au Chocolat Recipe"
MERGE (p)-[:CREATES]->(f)

column1: Recipe Name: 50 Uses for Vinegar. Ingredients: white vinegar, vinegar, Instructions: Kill grass on walks and driveways. Kill weeds. Spray full strength on growth until plants have starved. Increase soil acidity. In hard water: one gallon of tap water for watering rhododendrons, gardenias, or azaleas. Deter ants. Spray vinegar around doors, appliances, and along other areas where ants are known. Polish car chrome. Apply full strength. Remove skunk odor from a dog. Rub fur with full strength vinegar; rinse. Keep cats away. Sprinkle vinegar on areas you dont want the cat walking, sleeping, or scratching on. Keep dogs from scratching his ears. Use a clean, soft cloth dipped in diluted vinegar. Keep chickens from pecking each other. Put a little in their drinking water. Tenderize meat. Soak in vinegar overnight. Freshen vegetables. Soak wilted vegetables in 2 cups of water and a tablespoon of vinegar. Boil better eggs. Add 2 tablespoons water before boiling eggs. Keeps them from cracking. Soothe a bee or jellyfish sting. Dot the irritation with vinegar and relieve itching. Relieve sunburn. Lightly rub white vinegar; you may have to reapply. Condition hair. Add a tablespoon of vinegar to dissolve sticky residue left by shampoo. Relieve dry and itchy skin. Add 2 tablespoons to bath water. Fight dandruff. After shampooing, rinse with vinegar and 2 cups of warm water. Soothe a sore throat. Put a teaspoon of vinegar in a glass of water. Gargle, then swallow. Treat sinus infections and chest colds. Add 1/4 cup or more vinegar to the vaporizer. Feel good. A teaspoon of apple cider vinegar in a glass of water, with a bit of honey added for flavor, will take the edge off your appetite and give you an overall healthy feeling. Deodorize the kitchen drain. Pour a cup down the drain once a week. Let stand 30 minutes and then flush with cold water. Eliminate onion odor. Rub on your fingers before and after slicing. Clean and disinfect wood cutting boards. Wipe with full strength vinegar. Remove fruit stains from hands. Rub with vinegar. Cut grease and odor on dishes. Add a tablespoon of vinegar to hot soapy water. Clean a teapot. Boil a mixture of water and vinegar in the teapot. Wipe away the grime. Freshen a lunchbox. Soak a piece of bread in vinegar and let it sit in the lunchbox over night. Clean the refrigerator. Wash with a solution of equal parts water and vinegar. Unclog a drain. Pour a handful of baking soda down the drain and add 1/2 cup of vinegar. Rinse with hot water. Clean and deodorize the garbage disposal. Make vinegar ice cubes and feed them down the disposal. After grinding, run cold water through. Clean and deodorize jars. Rinse mayonnaise, peanut butter, and mustard jars with vinegar when empty. Clean the dishwasher. Run a cup of vinegar through the whole cycle once a month to reduce soap build up on the inner mechanisms and on glassware. Clean stainless steel. Wipe with a vinegar dampened cloth. Clean china and fine glassware. Add a cup of vinegar to a sink of warm water. Gently dip the glass or china in the solution and let dry. Get stains out of pots. Fill pot with a solution of 3 tablespoons of vinegar to a pint of water. Boil until stain loosens and can be washed away. Clean the microwave. Boil a solution of 1/4 cup of vinegar and 1 cup of water in the microwave. Will loosen splattered on food and deodorize. Dissolve rust from bolts and other metals. Soak in full strength vinegar. Get rid of cooking smells. Let simmer a small pot of vinegar and water solution. Unclog steam iron. Pour equal amounts of vinegar and water into the irons water chamber. Turn to steam and leave the iron on for 5 minutes in an upright position. Then unplug and allow to cool. Any loose particles should come out when you empty the water. Clean a scorched iron plate. Heat equal parts vinegar and salt in a small pan. Rub solution on the cooled iron surface to remove dark or burned stains. Get rid of lint in clothes. Add 1/2 cup of vinegar to the rinse cycle. Keep colors from running. Immerse clothes in full strength vinegar before washing. Freshen up the washing machine. Periodically, pour a cup of vinegar in the machine and let in run through a regular cycle (no clothes added). Will dissolve soap residue. Brighten fabric colors. Add a 1/2 cup vinegar to the rinse cycle. Take grease off suede. Dip a toothbrush in vinegar and gently brush over grease spot. Remove tough stains. Gently rub on fruit, jam, mustard, coffee, tea. Then wash as usual. Get smoke smell out of clothes. Add a cup of vinegar to a bath tub of hot water. Hang clothes above the steam. Remove decals. Brush with a couple coats of vinegar. Allow to soak inches Wash off. Clean eyeglasses. Wipe each lens with a drop of vinegar. Freshen cut flowers. Add 2 tablespoons vinegar and 1 teaspoon sugar for each quart of water. A shallow bowl of vinegar in any room (where it wont get knocked over) will remove any odors: smoke, paint fumes, new carpet or lino off-gassing, sick rooms, litter box, food etc. Great for those with allergies to commercial room sprays. Freeze cubes vinegar in an ice cube tray. Throw one in the garbage disposal at the end of stuff or just to freshen it and sharpen the blades a bit.
